Package org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Interface ScaleId

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Key, PropertyKey
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultScaleId
    public interface ScaleId
extends PropertyKey
    Represents the scale id of a scale/axis object.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
